# Setting Up Your Ipad On Kiosk Mode

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/setting-up-your-ipad-on-kiosk-mode/

## Category
14 Business Setup

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
PAYMENTS
PAYMENT HARDWARE
Setting Up the iPad Kiosk Mode
IN THIS ARTICLE
Enable Guided Access on your iPad
Disable Auto-Lock on your iPad
Enable Kiosk Mode
Disable Kiosk Mode

After setting up your Front Desk Display, enable Kiosk Mode on your iPad. Kiosk Mode ensures the iPad stays locked on the Mangomint app and restricts users from accessing other apps, settings, and device functionalities.

To enable Kiosk Mode:

Enable Guided Access on your iPad.

Disable Auto-Lock on your iPad.

Enable Kiosk Mode.

Link copied
Enable Guided Access on your iPad

To enable Guided Access on your iPad, go to Settings > Accessibility > Guided Access.

Enable Guided Access. Tap Passcode Settings.

Tap Set Guided Access Passcode and enter a passcode. You will need to use this passcode later to disable Guided Access. You can also use Touch ID or Face ID if it is available on your iPad.

Tap Guided Access to return to the Guided Access settings.

Enable the Accessibility Shortcut, and set the Display Auto-Lock to Never.

Link copied
Disable Auto-Lock on your iPad

To disable Auto-Lock on your iPad, go to Settings > Display & Brightness > Auto-Lock and select Never.

Link copied
Enable Kiosk Mode

To enable Kiosk Mode, open the Mangomint app on your iPad.

Triple-click the home/top button and tap Start.

Kiosk Mode is now enabled. The iPad will stay locked on the Mangomint app, and users will be restricted from accessing other apps, settings, and device functionalities.

Once Kiosk Mode is enabled, the Kiosk mode is disabled message will be removed. If the message is not removed, disable Kiosk Mode, restart your iPad, and re-enable Kiosk Mode.

Note: 

To change the background color of your welcome screen, open the Settings app and select Business Setup > Logo & Branding to update your brand color. Learn more about Logo & Branding settings.

Link copied
Disable Kiosk Mode

To disable Kiosk Mode, triple-click the home/top button, enter your Guided Access passcode, and tap End.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
